website_summaries.verdict: While this set has some nice features, it also comes with some quality concerns and dependencies that you may not expect for the higher price.
pros: Many owners rave about how well the balls work for tournament play, yet they are just as practical for backyard play
cons: Rare reports of balls being smaller than the indicated regulation size

customer_reviews.title: Description is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Item is misrepresented as 107 mm. When in actuality they are only 101 mm. They are not 4.2 inches (107 mm), they are not even 4 inches as stated on the tag. 101 mm converted to inches is 3.97.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: NOT 107 mm
customer_reviews.text: The description says it's 107mm but as you can see from the tag that came on the bag, it's not. I measured them to see if the tag on the bag was correct and it was. Sorry, I understand we are talking a small difference but they are in fact 101mm. The website description is not accurate. I bought these because the description said they were 107mm and that's what the bocce league specifies in their rule book. The bag they came in is very nice and the balls nest in there very well. Nice set and I would have been happy to own them if they were the size described.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this item
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked for a bocce set for his birthday and was very pleased with this one. This is a traditional/regulation set, so if your looking for something to play with little kids, maybe you want to consider something else. The balls are heavier, but once you get used to them it is fun to play. We are 60+ in age, so it's not that hard to get use to the weight. We've had it a month now. Excellent quality, good workmanship. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really great value at this marked down price with free shipping. Great quality set with a good carrier bag also. Shipped fast!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Comparato

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I was at first a little concerned that the size and weight would be difficult for my wife, but she still managed to beat me on our second game. We both love the set. The finish on the balls and the weightiness of them gives the feeling of excellent quality. The carrying case is very nice, too. I'd highly recommend this beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: DrPaul0401

customer_reviews.title: Have to ask for second set in two pack
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine, but I had to call amazon to get the second part of the two pack shipped out. The price is ~2x what a single set of bocce balls costs and it is advertised as a two pack, I'd give 5 stars if both sets came without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: RyanAssoc

customer_reviews.title: Half of the balls shattered in my first 10 games
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a recommendation from a friend and I really wanted to get into playing. The item is listed as capable of being played on most surfaces. We only played in grass but still broke 4 of the balls in the first 2 weeks. They started out as small chips but eventually cracked large pieces off. Get a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Bocce ball set- great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy set. We use them weekly and have not had any issues. They are regulation size/weight for Special Olympic competition.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Salazar

customer_reviews.title: ball chipped in first use
customer_reviews.text: the ball chipped in the first game ever. Playing on the beach with a few buried rocks and one of the balls chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Brashier

customer_reviews.title: Picnic activities
customer_reviews.text: Played this game before and found it a good relaxing picnic game
customer_reviews.author: Brooks M Bowne

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: One ball broke after rhe third time I played with it. The outer layer shattered. Expensive for the level of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E. Lovera

customer_reviews.title: met expectations
customer_reviews.text: We got the sale price and are extremely happy with these balls. With a bit more user improvement they will even be better.
customer_reviews.author: frederf

customer_reviews.title: Breaking my balls
customer_reviews.text: We liked are set, until one of the balls broke. I will remove this three star review if the company sends me another red square ball or offered to sell me a discounted set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome. The carrying case is really handy & high ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my brother for Christmas. It's awesome. The carrying case is really handy & high quality. The white pallino is much easier to see in the grass than other colors I've seen. Balls seem to be the same quality as my parent's set that they've had for 35+ years, so it should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie P.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with gift
customer_reviews.text: The bocce sets were gifts for a bocce group. They were very pleased with that they had two identical sets for the two courts that they use. I have not received any complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Margoni

customer_reviews.title: Not the size set that was offered
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice bocce ball set, but I did not receive the size I was offered. The description was the 107 mm size and I recieved the 101mm size
customer_reviews.author: matthew wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality finish and the balls are much heavier than 920 grams
customer_reviews.text: Althought the circumference is correct at 107mm, the balls are not the official weight of 920 grams... all weighed between 950 and 1025 grams. Additionally, there are many imperfections in every ball... many light spots and other discolorations. Since there are no actual indents or nicks in the surface, I do not intend to return, but the quality in the finish was very disappointing. If I could do it over, I would have paid the extra $30 and purchased the Perfetta Professional Bocce Set. The weight being off is very annoying, but I guess that's why Baden doesn't advertise a weight specification. The bag seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of bocce balls. Really enjoy they when we play.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis L Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement tape measure.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with destroyed tape measure. Not suitable for a gift delivered in this fashion. Now I must return the entire set for a replacement tape measure (worth only a fraction of the shipping cost) or accept a damaged purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dagostini

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, all scratched up after 1 game
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case is great, love the two volor theme, easy to see teams and assess points, measuring tool is key they eye does not cut it!!! However, disappointed with only one time playing and they are completely scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and love the carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and love the carrying case, but paint started coming off during first game ... on grass... Wish the color had stayed fresh longer, but still usable and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Set!
customer_reviews.text: This Bocce set is one of the nicest we've owned! The balls are a good size and weight and they have a hard finish. The carrying case is nice with a center divider to help keep its shape. I agree with the other review that the color of the balls was off compared to the website as the red balls are a much brighter red than the burgandy red shown. Other than that I think it's a good product for the money! Plus free shipping with Amazon - Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a cheaper set. My husband and sons(13)and(20) enjoyed playing on the lawn all weekend with this real set. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: GLV

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I research and read reviews for weeks on Bocce balls. My main concern, above everything else was weight. Although I wanted good quality as well, I wanted correct weight. This product lived up to it's reviews. I was very impressed by the quality. I used them at the beach a lot, so they tended to scuff up, however wiping them with a towel took a lot of the discoloration out. Overall I am very happy with my purchase. I have played bocce my whole life, and cheap underweight balls were not going to be acceptable. I highly suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissymazz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balls are round and heavy. The bag adequately hold the balls in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a high quality set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my very particular Italian mother. They are high quality, regulation size. Not the same as a set you’ll find at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wolber

customer_reviews.title: Not correct size
customer_reviews.text: These are not 107mm. They are 90mm. They seem to be good quality, but they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: NICE SET
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A NICE SET AND FEELS GOOD IN YOUR HANDS. THE ONLY PROBLEM I HAVE IS THE CASE COULD BE MORE USER FRIENDLY.
customer_reviews.author: mark grad

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We are huge bocce fans and wanted to give our son and his family a set. The price was right and the quality very good.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and arrived on time as promised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as a, " Father's Day " gift and he loved it and was very excited to get it. My son was very impressed with the quality of the item .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Great quaity set
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality set, the contents exactly as advertised. Finish, weight and size just as they should be. The bag sturdy and space-saver. All of this features guarantee a combination resulting in a lasting set of bocce.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO PC

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, weight is great and good size too! We had a 16 team tournament and everyone thought these were great!
customer_reviews.author: SEngle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality set. Comes in a sturdy bag. Balls are very well crafted and look like they will be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Zandian

customer_reviews.title: He is very pleased w/the set - high quality
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for son-in-law. He is very pleased w/the set - high quality, good carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Madre

customer_reviews.title: Nice set - finish scratches easily when played on crushed ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set - finish scratches easily when played on crushed oyster bocce court.
customer_reviews.author: findagoodbuy

customer_reviews.title: Good BOCCE Ball set
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for the community to play bocce. It fits our needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Dyer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set. The balls have a good weight to them. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the casual player!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use them frequently but it is a great set for the occasional backyard bbque and games day.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Solid set - professional spec
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and feel, sturdy urethane. I used even in a public park on gravelly court. Some white marks that washed off with a wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Marasmus

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: They arrived bright and shiny but began to scratch through the shiny outer layer on the very first roll. They look beat up after a few rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: More expensive that other options but well worth the quality!! Got a 2nd one as a gift for someone after buying a cheap version at a dept. store.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Super high-quality resin balls don't get dented. The bag is strong enough to carry anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S

customer_reviews.title: the quality the best, enjoying the Bocce Ball set very much
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, quick shipment, the quality the best, enjoying the Bocce Ball set very much.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Blystone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set for our family to use at the new bocce court at our swim club
customer_reviews.author: ViennaTurtles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Top quality. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: jim retzer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, although the color wears off pretty quickly. But great balls!
customer_reviews.author: thegerms

customer_reviews.title: Great bocce balls my husband and friends live them
customer_reviews.text: Looked at reviews and these won!! Great bocce balls my husband and friends live them!!
customer_reviews.author: jolynn dmpsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bocce balls for my boyfriend and I was impressed with the weight and quality of the set. I grew up playing with a set that was brought from Italy by my relatives (bocce is requisite for any and all family picnics). This set is comparable to the real deal. If you're looking for a good quality bocce set, pay a little more and go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. Full size heavy balls. Much better than the cheap versions that can be found at department stores. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Waite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set in a sturdy carrying/storage case. Whole family enjoyed this set. Recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy set
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy set. I remember playing this at family gatherings back home with a set like this that was always kept in a burlap sack tied with string. I tried looking at sets from local stores and walmart but wasn't happy when I'd pick up the container because they felt so light and cheap. These are the heavy ones you're looking for so you can get a good loft and heavy thud to land it right next to the pic.
customer_reviews.author: E. Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and item
customer_reviews.text: Got this a couple of days ago and I have to say that the reviews that say the beg is bad are completely wrong. My set is great and seems to be made well. The bag is cool and does not seem flimsy at all. Balls weigh good and heavy like they are supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: kdatrio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heft to them and don't buy if you will get upset with a few scratches
customer_reviews.text: Bought them in anticipation of a family get together and the set is great but the comments about the finish getting easily scratched are correct but who really cares - it's an outdoor lawn game not a dining room decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzy

customer_reviews.title: One of the balls broke on third use. It ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the balls broke on third use. It killed the vibe of our party. Balls can't break when it matters. Very let down :(
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Scott Montalto

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set of bocce balls!
customer_reviews.text: couldn't be happier with this set as my beach game go to. not sure if this helps, but since i am a customer service fan...one of the balls cracked after a long distance direct hit. contacted baden via email and i had a replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jijjle

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to take Upstate with him to play with the guys. He loved it. Great bag it came with.
customer_reviews.author: TammyGirl

customer_reviews.title: A very professional set
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing with Italian uncles who only ever used sets imported from Italy. These have the same feel & appearance as "the real deal", wherever they're made...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Rossettie

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: All you need now is beer and a playing field. Tons of fun. Bought it for family and friend outings.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Kana

customer_reviews.title: Good But Scratches Easily
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine for grass. But if the grass or surface played on is rough, the balls will get scraped and paint will be removed. Don't use in sand, or dried grass areas unless you don't mind seeing the balls marked up with scrapes. Also one ball became chipped after the first use. Only players were adults, so no rough play by children has touched this Bocce ball set. Otherwise this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: BeFamousVideo

customer_reviews.title: My set was missing the white ball when we opened ...
customer_reviews.text: My set was missing the white ball when we opened it, which was very disappointing. Bought a lacrosse ball to replace it since all the real replacement balls are about 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and made to last.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality set of Bocce balls. Heavy duty and made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Long

customer_reviews.title: Great bocce set
customer_reviews.text: Great bocce set, and easy. I went to 4 places trying to find a set with no luck. On line, a couple of clicks, and the next day the set was sitting at the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Seng

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the bag with Santillo Written on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bocce Ball Set good value for leisure play
customer_reviews.text: This bocce ball set seems to be good quality for family/leisure plan. No problems with it. Has some scratches from hitting small stones but overall holding up ok.
customer_reviews.author: GAP

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: Very good set, heavy duty. The teenagers loved it, although they said it was heavy. Which I took for a complement.
customer_reviews.author: Robroy

customer_reviews.title: Great bocce set!
customer_reviews.text: We had played bocce at a party recently and decided to get a set similar in quality to what we had used. As it turns out, it is the same set we had played with and it is just what we wanted. Balls are rock-solid and durable (one ball hit a rock full-on in an errant toss without a mark). Carry bag is well thought out and convenient. We recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: R. Barrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my co-worker to give to her son and apparently they are just what he wanted! Not too small I was told!
customer_reviews.author: Nasreen Rana

customer_reviews.title: Bocce
customer_reviews.text: Well , the bag is lovely the playing balls are well constructed and have good weight to them. That being said it arrived WITHOUT the pallino.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back because it is too heavy for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back because it is too heavy for the beach. We have to walk to our beach and carrying these would have been a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: virginia o. rose

product_meta.title: Baden Champions Bocce Ball Set – Official Size 107mm & Official Weight 920g with Carry Case and Measuring Tape
product_meta.description: Take the family on a trip to Naples without leaving your backyard with the Baden Champions bocce ball set. This regulation size 107mm and weight 2lbs per ball bocce set has been constructed with the true backyard games connoisseur in mind. The age-old outdoor game of bocce ball has traditionally been played on natural soil or crushed stone courts but can be played on a variety of different terrains including grassy lawn surfaces. Baden’s bocce sets are constructed with a premium poly-resin from surface through the core, unlike most competitors using a concrete core with filler. Baden’s bocce set also comes with multiple scoring patterns on the balls (circle vs stripes) allowing for up to (2-8) players per round. Included with your set is a durable carrying bag for easy storage and transportation. The International Standards of Bocce Ball have determined that a circumference of 107mm (4.2 inches) and a weight of 920g (2lbs.) per ball is the international standard, which Baden’s set adheres to.
feature_bullets: 2020 Update – Our improved set now meets the Bocce Standards Association’s official size 107mm (4.2 inches”) and weight of 920g (2 lbs.)
Bocce set includes - (4) Green and (4) red, 107mm bocce balls, (1) White 60mm pallino, and (1) 5’-foot measuring tape.
Highest quality – We listened to our customers and upgraded to a solid polyresin construction and official weight of 2lbs (920g +/- 10g).
High Visibility - Our sets include a full size pallino, making it easy to see and prevents it from getting lost in the lawn.
Bocce Balls - come with multiple scoring patterns making it a great game for groups of (2-8) players
Great for – tournaments, yard games, family picnics, camps, and social events

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
